borealis.client
Class Marshal

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--borealis.client.Marshal
public abstract class Marshal
extends java.lang.Object

The Java-counterpart of the marshaling code.

Version:
1.0 02/04/2005
Author:
Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhhwang@cs.brown.edu)

Field Detail

shortRepresentation

public static boolean shortRepresentation
Whether to use the short representation or not. If gcc 3.3.5 is used, then this static field must be set to false.

Constructor Detail

Marshal

public Marshal(java.lang.String ip,
               int rpcPort,
               int receivePort,
               borealis.client.TupleReceptionEventHandler handler)
Constructs a Marshal object.

Parameters:
ip - the ip address of the Borealis node to talk with.
rpcPort - the rpc port of the Borealis node to talk with.
receivePort - my tcp port to receive Tuples.
handler - the handler for the event of receiving a Tuple.
Method Detail

register

public static void register(java.lang.String input,
                            java.lang.String tupleClass)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Registers an input with its associated tuple class.

Parameters:
input - the name of the Borealis input.
tupleClass - the name of the tuple class.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the specified tuple class is not available.

connectInput

public void connectInput(java.lang.String input,
                         java.lang.String ip,
                         int port)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Establishes a connection to a Borealis input.

Parameters:
input - the name of the Borealis input.
ip - the ip address associated with the Borealis input.
port - the port number associated with the Borealis input.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if cannot connect to the specified input.

batchInput

public void batchInput(java.lang.String input,
                       borealis.client.Tuple tuple)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Adds a tuple to the batch of tuples bound for the specified input.

Parameters:
input - the name of the Borealis input.
tuple - the tuple to add to the batch of tuples.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the connection to the specified input doesn't exist.

send

public void send(java.lang.String input)
          throws java.lang.Exception
Sends out the batch of tuples accumulated so far to the specified input (one tuple batch per input).

Parameters:
input - the Borealis input to receive the tuple batch.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the connection to the specified input doesn't exist or the transmission fails.

connectOutput

public void connectOutput(java.lang.String output,
                          java.lang.String ip)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Establishes a connection to a Borealis output.

Parameters:
output - the name of the Borealis output.
ip - the ip address of the borealis node to talk to.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if cannot connect to the specified output.
